summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of EdTech platform. All backend APIs (13/13) and frontend flows working perfectly. Student registration, login, course access, video-quiz loop, progress tracking, and parent dashboard all functional.
passed_tests: Student registration and login with JWT
Parent dashboard showing correct child information
Parent activity section with recent courses
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (13/13 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all flows working)
